goguest.subtitle: Goguest is an ingenious and versatile platform that provides the hospitality industry multiple IT solutions for operating their businesses with RFID/NFC among other technology resources in order to deliver unique experiences for end users through the use of smart wearable technology.
goguest.mini_content: Goguest improves customer interaction, creates extraordinary experiences, increases revenue and transforms guests into loyal customers.

gofun.subtitle: Gofun is an IT solution for the entertainment industries that enables organizers to implement a cashless payment system, track crowd capacity in real-time and access control, easy ticketing service and other functionalities through the use of smart wearable technology and RFID/NFC.
gofun.mini_content: With Gofun you can increase spend-per-head, eliminate ticket fraud/pass-sharing, reduce operating costs, less queuing time and faster lanes and agile processes.
